attributes.action: Financial safety net for ALL KEY workers.
attributes.additional_details: Making up some of the least paid blue collar Jobs, most cannot afford sickness that will last 2 weeks + more likely longer. Not only will they risk they're lives some will inevitably end up in large debt / hunger on basic Sick Pay. Give those ready to serve the reassurance and insurance that they can do so.
attributes.background: Key workers to receive FULL PAY if in isolation due to COVID-19 not SSP ( Statuary sick pay ). SAFTEY NET.

rejection.details:
Ensure employees are paid their full wage if they can't work due to coronavirus: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301652

Pay Key Workers 2 weeks full pay if they have to isolate: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/309104

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
